modName: Vampiric Drain level up Destruction skill
summary: Vampiric Drain level up Destruction skill
descriptionHtml:
I use scripts to give experience when use Vampiric Drain spell.
For some reason in vanilla game Vampiric Drain don't level up Destruction skill. When used Concentration + Absorb(like in Vanilla) in magic effect properties Vampiric Drain don't give experience, but if change to Fire and forget + Absorb Vampiric Drain start to give experience, but spell starts feel different.
So i make scripts that give experience when use vanilla Vampiric Drain.
1 lvl spell 6xp/sec
2 lvl spell 10xp/sec
3lvl spell 13xp/sec
4 lvl spell 17xp/sec
For example Flames spell cost 14 magicka/sec and give 14xp/sec, Vampiric Drain 4 lvl cost 17 magicka/sec and give 17xp/sec.
If used with Dual Casting Perk it will give only half experience. Lvl 4 spell casted from both hands will give 34 xp/sec, with Dual Casting 17xp/sec, but vanilla spells like Flames have same result.
Also i did an option file that enable Novice Perk in Destraction that half cost for Vampiric Drain.

Edit!!!(english version):
Just notice that it was russian version of the files, added english version.
author: Xom94oK
